definition: poor/destitute/to use up/to exhaust/thoroughly/extremely/(coll.) persistently and pointlessly

sentences.english: He eased some of the strains on the poor.
One on offer . In India the poor, proportionately, are more likely to vote.
sentences.chinese: 按比例来说，印度的穷人比中产阶级更乐于参加投票。

sentences.english: Fig 1 helps illustrate the difference between good and poor wettability.
sentences.chinese: 图1说明帮助之间的区别和穷人良好的润湿性。

sentences.english: The law does not discriminate against the poor in favour of the rich.
sentences.chinese: 法律绝不歧视穷人而偏袒富人。

sentences.english: Aware of the poor in society, mixed with the bitterness of Kula .
sentences.chinese: 知道穷人在社会中混的辛酸苦辣。

sentences.english: Those mounds were the tombs of poor people before 1945.
sentences.chinese: 那些乱坟堆，都是解放前穷人的墓地。

sentences.english: The dainties of the great are the tears of the poor.
sentences.chinese: 富人口中的美味是穷人眼中的泪水。

sentences.english: And the workhouses, where poor people can live and work?
sentences.chinese: 还有可供穷人生活和工作的济贫院呢？

sentences.english: Who wants to respond to the first one, the poor need the money more?
sentences.chinese: 谁愿意回应第一条反对，穷人更需要钱？

sentences.english: Nothing is a treasure, it makes the poor have the impulse to change destiny.
sentences.chinese: 一无所有是一种财富，它让穷人产生改变命运的冲动。

sentences.english: I found myself gasping over the tragedy of the poor people's lives that the play portrayed so well.
sentences.chinese: 我不由惊叹这部戏剧对于穷人苦难生活描写入木三分。

sentences.english: Laws grind the poor, and rich men rule the law. (Oliver Goldsmith, British writer)
sentences.chinese: 法律吸吮穷人的膏血，而富人却掌握着权柄。

sentences.english: Their slums are filled with desperatelypoor people who have fled worse poverty in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 那里的贫民区住满了不顾一切逃离最贫穷乡村的穷人。

sentences.english: They need to be countered by pro-poor policy decisions.
sentences.chinese: 需要对之作出有益穷人的政策决定。

sentences.english: Are there any policies that are intended to improve the life of the poor?
sentences.chinese: 有什么旨在改善穷人生活的政策吗？

sentences.english: He says little of the income from oil, the mining and extractive sectors trickle down to the poor.
sentences.chinese: 他说，石油和矿产资源出口带来的收入很少惠及穷人。

definition: poor/destitute/to use up/to exhaust/thoroughly/extremely/(coll.) persistently and pointlessly
the benevolent man cannot be rich (idiom, from Mencius). It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle than for a rich man to enter the kingdom of heaven (Matthew 19:24).
poor and with low expectations/poverty stunts ambition
